text: We have the brightest, smartest people coming out of our colleges and universities and the vast majority, 98 per cent them are following all the protocols (and) procedures but a couple per cent are going hog wild

comments.text: Agree. There are many young people think they are invincible.

text: As things are beginning to reopen, we want to get out, but at the same time many of us are still feeling trepidation. Is the time right? How do I keep myself and my family safe? These are valid concerns.

comments.text: growing quarantine fatigue in Canada, but we have to pace ourselves.

text: When I first got symptoms it was primarily a cough. A week later ... it suddenly took a turn for the worse. My temperature spiked to 104, and I became somewhat delirious

comments.text: Same here. I had no idea how sick I was and donâ€™t remember much from the several days before and after being admitted
